languages.text: {n}Слуга манит собеседников поближе и заговорщически шепчет:{/n} "Звездн{rt_mf|ый|ая} Госпо{rt_mf|дин|жа} — чудовище. Вы меня не слушали, а я вам докажу, и Мейв подтвердит. Слыхали про случай с мутантами? Так вот, начали искать виноватых. А Звездн{rt_mf|ый|ая} Госпо{rt_mf|дин|жа} возьми и {d|Encyclopedia:FW_MoraliteKillAllDecision}потребуй обоих якобы виновных — в печь{/d}, развлечения ради... верно говорю, Мейв?"
languages.translation_comment: если сожгли коменданта и палача в MoraliteAftermath

traits.locale_text: {n}Слуга манит собеседников поближе и заговорщически шепчет:{/n} "Звездн{rt_mf|ый|ая} Госпо{rt_mf|дин|жа} — чудовище. Вы меня не слушали, а я вам докажу, и Мейв подтвердит. Слыхали про случай с мутантами? Так вот, начали искать виноватых. А Звездн{rt_mf|ый|ая} Госпо{rt_mf|дин|жа} возьми и {d|Encyclopedia:FW_MoraliteKillAllDecision}потребуй обоих якобы виновных — в печь{/d}, развлечения ради... верно говорю, Мейв?"
traits.speaker: FW_GossipingCommoner3

languages.translation_comment: если сожгли коменданта и палача в MoraliteAftermath

languages.text: {n}The servant gestures at the others to come closer and says in a conspiratorial whisper,{/n} "The Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} is a monster. You didn't listen to me, but I'll prove it, and Maive will confirm it. Heard about the mutant disaster? Well, they started looking for the culprits. They found two so-called suspects, and the Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} just {d|Encyclopedia:FW_MoraliteKillAllDecision}had them both thrown into a furnace{/d} for {rt_mf|his|her} amusement... Am I right, Maive?"
languages.original_text: {n}Слуга манит собеседников поближе и заговорщически шепчет:{/n} "Звездн{rt_mf|ый|ая} Госпо{rt_mf|дин|жа} — чудовище. Вы меня не слушали, а я вам докажу, и Мейв подтвердит. Слыхали про случай с мутантами? Так вот, начали искать виноватых. А Звездн{rt_mf|ый|ая} Госпо{rt_mf|дин|жа} возьми и {d|Encyclopedia:FW_MoraliteKillAllDecision}потребуй обоих якобы виновных — в печь{/d}, развлечения ради... верно говорю, Мейв?"

traits.locale_text: {n}The servant gestures at the others to come closer and says in a conspiratorial whisper,{/n} "The Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} is a monster. You didn't listen to me but I'll prove it, and Maive will confirm it. Heard about the mutant incident? Well, they started looking for the culprits. They found two suspects, and the Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} just had them both thrown into a furnace for {rt_mf|his|her} amusement... That was how it happened, am I right, Maive?"

languages.text: {n}眼前的仆人朝其他人做着手势，示意大家靠近，之后以充满阴谋意味的声音低语道。{/n}“那位来自上界的大人简直是个怪物。我知道你们不信，但我可以证明，梅芙也可以为我作证。你听说那群变种人暴乱的事情了吗？他们觉得变种人里藏着邪教徒，最后找到了两位所谓的嫌疑犯。至于那位来自上界的大人，{rt_mf|他|她}{d|Encyclopedia:FW_MoraliteKillAllDecision}把那两个人全都丢进了炉子里{/d}，供{rt_mf|他|她}取乐……我没说错吧，梅芙？”
languages.original_text: {n}The servant gestures at the others to come closer and says in a conspiratorial whisper,{/n} "The Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} is a monster. You didn't listen to me, but I'll prove it, and Maive will confirm it. Heard about the mutant disaster? Well, they started looking for the culprits. They found two so-called suspects, and the Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} just {d|Encyclopedia:FW_MoraliteKillAllDecision}had them both thrown into a furnace{/d} for {rt_mf|his|her} amusement... Am I right, Maive?"

traits.locale_text: {n}眼前的仆人朝其他人做着手势，示意大家靠近，之后以充满阴谋意味的声音低语道。{/n}“那位来自上界的大人简直是个怪物。我知道你们不信，但我可以证明，梅芙也可以为我作证。你听说那群变种人暴乱的事情了吗？他们觉得变种人里藏着邪教徒，最后找到了两位所谓的嫌疑犯。至于那位来自上界的大人，{rt_mf|他|她}把那两个人全都丢进了炉子里，供{rt_mf|他|她}取乐……我没说错吧，梅芙？”
{n}眼前的仆人朝其他人做着手势，示意大家靠近，之后以充满阴谋意味的声音低语道。{/n}“那位来自上界的大人简直是个怪物。我知道你们不信，但我可以证明，梅芙也可以为我作证。你听说那群变种人暴乱的事情了吗？他们觉得变种人里藏着邪教徒，最后找到了两位所谓的嫌疑犯。至于那位来自上界的大人，{rt_mf|他|她}把那两个人全都丢进了炉子里，供{rt_mf|他|她}取乐……我没说错吧，梅芙？”

languages.text: {n}El sirviente indica a los demás que se acerquen y susurra en tono conspirador:{/n} «{rt_mf|El Señor Celestial|La Señora Celestial} es un monstruo. No me habéis hecho caso, pero lo demostraré y Maive lo confirmará. ¿Habéis oído lo del desastre del mutante? Bueno, pues empezaron a buscar culpables. Atraparon a dos sospechosos y {rt_mf|el Señor Celestial|la Señora Celestial} hizo que {d|Encyclopedia:FW_MoraliteKillAllDecision}los arrojaran a ambos a un horno{/d} por diversión... ¿Estoy en lo cierto, Maive?».
languages.original_text: {n}The servant gestures at the others to come closer and says in a conspiratorial whisper,{/n} "The Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} is a monster. You didn't listen to me, but I'll prove it, and Maive will confirm it. Heard about the mutant disaster? Well, they started looking for the culprits. They found two so-called suspects, and the Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} just {d|Encyclopedia:FW_MoraliteKillAllDecision}had them both thrown into a furnace{/d} for {rt_mf|his|her} amusement... Am I right, Maive?"

languages.text: {n}Hizmetkâr, yaklaşmaları için diğerlerine işaret edip kulaklarına fısıldıyor,{/n} "Semavi {rt_mf|Lordumuz|Leydimiz} bir canavar. Beni dinlemediniz ama kanıtlayacağım, Maive de onaylayacak. Mutant felaketini duydunuz mu? Suçlu aramaya başladılar. Sözde iki şüpheli buldular, Semavi {rt_mf|Lordumuz|Leydimiz} da eğlencesine {d|Encyclopedia:FW_MoraliteKillAllDecision}ikisini de fırına attırdı{/d}... Haklı mıyım Maive?"
languages.original_text: {n}The servant gestures at the others to come closer and says in a conspiratorial whisper,{/n} "The Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} is a monster. You didn't listen to me, but I'll prove it, and Maive will confirm it. Heard about the mutant disaster? Well, they started looking for the culprits. They found two so-called suspects, and the Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} just {d|Encyclopedia:FW_MoraliteKillAllDecision}had them both thrown into a furnace{/d} for {rt_mf|his|her} amusement... Am I right, Maive?"

languages.text: {n}使用人は他の者たちにもっと近くに来るように手振りし、秘密めいた囁き声で言う。{/n}「天の{rt_mf|君|姫}はモンスターだよ。俺から聞いたとは言わないでくれ、でもそれを証明して、メイヴが確認するだろう。変異体の身に降りかかったこと、聞いた？彼らは容疑者の捜索を始めたみたいで、いわゆる二人の容疑者を見つけて、天の{rt_mf|君|姫}はその楽しみのために彼ら{d|Encyclopedia:FW_MoraliteKillAllDecision}二人をかまどに放り投げたってことだ…{/d}そうだよね、メイヴ？」
languages.original_text: {n}The servant gestures at the others to come closer and says in a conspiratorial whisper,{/n} "The Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} is a monster. You didn't listen to me, but I'll prove it, and Maive will confirm it. Heard about the mutant disaster? Well, they started looking for the culprits. They found two so-called suspects, and the Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} just {d|Encyclopedia:FW_MoraliteKillAllDecision}had them both thrown into a furnace{/d} for {rt_mf|his|her} amusement... Am I right, Maive?"

traits.locale_text: {n}使用人は他の者たちにもっと近くに来るように手振りし、秘密めいた囁き声で言う。{/n}「天の{rt_mf|君|姫}はモンスターだよ。俺から聞いたとは言わないでくれ、でもそれを証明して、メイヴが確認するだろう。変異体の身に降りかかったこと、聞いた？彼らは容疑者の捜索を始めたみたいで、いわゆる二人の容疑者を見つけて、天の{rt_mf|君|姫}はその楽しみのために彼ら二人をかまどに放り投げたってことだ…そうだよね、メイヴ？」

{n}使用人は他の者たちにもっと近くに来るように手振りし、秘密めいた囁き声で言う。{/n}「天の{rt_mf|君|姫}はモンスターだよ。俺から聞いたとは言わないでくれ、でもそれを証明して、メイヴが確認するだろう。変異体の身に降りかかったこと、聞いた？彼らは容疑者の捜索を始めたみたいで、いわゆる二人の容疑者を見つけて、天の{rt_mf|君|姫}はその楽しみのために彼ら二人をかまどに放り投げたってことだ…そうだよね、メイヴ？」

languages.text: {n}Le serviteur fait signe aux autres de se rapprocher et dit dans un chuchotement conspirateur :{/n} « {rt_mf|Le Seigneur|La Seigneure} Céleste est un monstre. Vous ne m'avez pas écouté, mais je vais le prouver, et Maive pourra confirmer. Vous avez entendu parler du désastre avec le mutant ? Eh bien, ils avaient commencé à chercher les coupables, mais {rt_mf|le Seigneur|la Seigneure} Céleste a {d|Encyclopedia:FW_MoraliteKillAllDecision}fait jeter les deux suspects dans un fourneau{/d} uniquement pour se divertir... J'ai pas raison, Maive ? »
languages.original_text: {n}The servant gestures at the others to come closer and says in a conspiratorial whisper,{/n} "The Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} is a monster. You didn't listen to me, but I'll prove it, and Maive will confirm it. Heard about the mutant disaster? Well, they started looking for the culprits. They found two so-called suspects, and the Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} just {d|Encyclopedia:FW_MoraliteKillAllDecision}had them both thrown into a furnace{/d} for {rt_mf|his|her} amusement... Am I right, Maive?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Le serviteur fait signe aux autres de se rapprocher et dit dans un chuchotement conspirateur :{/n} « {rt_mf|Le Seigneur|La Seigneure} Céleste est un monstre. Vous ne m'avez pas écouté, mais je vais le prouver, et Maive pourra confirmer. Vous avez entendu parler du désastre avec le mutant ? Eh bien, ils avaient commencé à chercher les coupables, mais {rt_mf|le Seigneur|la Seigneure} Céleste a fait jeter les deux suspects dans un fourneau uniquement pour se divertir... J'ai pas raison, Maive ? »

{n}Le serviteur fait signe aux autres de se rapprocher et dit dans un chuchotement conspirateur :{/n} « {rt_mf|Le Seigneur|La Seigneure} Céleste est un monstre. Vous ne m'avez pas écouté, mais je vais le prouver, et Maive pourra confirmer. Vous avez entendu parler du désastre avec le mutant ? Eh bien, ils avaient commencé à chercher les coupables, mais {rt_mf|le Seigneur|la Seigneure} Céleste a fait jeter les deux suspects dans un fourneau uniquement pour se divertir... J'ai pas raison, Maive ? »

languages.text: {n}Der Diener bedeutet den anderen, dass sie näher kommen sollen, und flüstert dann verschwörerisch:{/n} "{rt_mf|Der himmlische Herr|Die himmlische Herrin} ist ein Monster. Ihr habt nicht auf mich gehört, aber ich beweise es und Maive wird es bestätigen. Habt Ihr von der Katastrophe mit den Mutanten gehört? Tja, sie haben angefangen, nach den Schuldigen zu suchen. Sie haben zwei so genannte Verdächtige gefunden, und {rt_mf|der himmlische Herr|die himmlische Herrin} hat sie beide einfach nur zu {rt_mf|seiner|ihrer} Belustigung {d|Encyclopedia:FW_MoraliteKillAllDecision}in einen Ofen werfen lassen{/d} ... Nicht wahr, Maive?"
languages.original_text: {n}The servant gestures at the others to come closer and says in a conspiratorial whisper,{/n} "The Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} is a monster. You didn't listen to me, but I'll prove it, and Maive will confirm it. Heard about the mutant disaster? Well, they started looking for the culprits. They found two so-called suspects, and the Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} just {d|Encyclopedia:FW_MoraliteKillAllDecision}had them both thrown into a furnace{/d} for {rt_mf|his|her} amusement... Nicht wahr, Maive?"
